name: GET_suppression-blocks-email
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific email address from your blocks list.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

email.description: The email address of the specific block.

$ul: **created**: A Unix timestamp indicating when the email address was added to the blocks list.
**email**: The email address that was added to the block list.
**reason**: An explanation for the reason of the block.
